name: Appsta
tag_list: apps, apps-lists, web-apps, iphone-apps, ipad-apps, android-apps, windows, mac, linux
overview:
Appsta.com is a collaborative website designed to offer users the widest choice of apps, tools, and information relevant to their needs. To do this, Appsta offers a constantly growing database of apps and tools categorized in a new and dynamic way.

The search engine makes it easy to find the right software, mobile or web app, and to compare features among results. No more paging through thousands of comments and being led in the wrong directions; Appsta only allows informative, high-quality reviews, and user-designed toolboxes can give you perfect software bundles for your specific purposes.

By registering, you can participate and improve the app, review and toolbox database.
